mapper.sql: id, ticket_id, shop_id, ticket_name, content, type_id, period_of_validity_startTime, period_of_validity_endTime, comment, status, collecting_method, is_retaken, is_re_use, create_time,amount
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM ety_ticket WHERE 1
AND create_time > #{today, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ;
SELECT t.`status` FROM `rel_user_ticket` ut, ety_ticket t WHERE ut.ut_id = #{tid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ut.ticket_id = t.ticket_id AND t.`status` = 1 ;
SELECT id, type_id, ticket_name FROM ety_ticket WHERE shop_id = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND STATUS = 1 GROUP BY type_id ORDER BY create_time DESC
